partnerDetails.about: Norton & Scallan was established in 1980 and is 100% Black Owned Company that has been audited by an accredited BEE agency. We are a value added supplier that supports Socio Economicc and Enterprise development. We always strive to supply a superior top quality range of electrical & instrumentation products and refrain from supplying cheap imitations. Our prompt and efficient service driven employees will endeavour to provide their best service at all times.
